0.title: [stationName] Winter Average Temperature
0.subTitle: December to February
0.caption: Average annual winter (December to February) temperature. The lowest (min) and highest (max) temperature of the month.

1.title: [stationName] Winter Average Temperature Difference from Baseline
1.caption: Difference between the winter (December-February)seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
